text: Rajanikanta Sen, also known as Kantakobi, (26 July 1865 â€“ 13 September 1910) was a Bengali poet and composer, known for his devotional (bhakti) compositions, as well as his patriotic songs. ==References== Category:1865 births Category:1910 deaths Category:Indian composers Category:Lyricists Category:Indian singers Category:Writers from Kolkata Category:19th-century Indian poets Category:Indian singer-songwriters Category:19th-century singers
title: Rajanikanta Sen
